data.title: RIVNE REGION INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITIES
data.meta_description: RIVNE REGION INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITIES - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
2. Head of Rivne region Head of Rivne state administration regional council Vasyl Bertash Uriy Kichatyi Rivne region is a promising location for investors. Favourable geographic position, significant industrial, resource and human potential, well-developed infrastructure, social and cultural sphere provide strong background for its further dynamic development. Nowadays it is an industrial and agricultural region, rich in natural resources (wood, water, deposits of amber, basalts, granites, tuffs, peat, feedstock for construction materials and glassware) and inhabited by hard-working and friendly people. With a view to efficient use of available resources and maintaining high profitability of production the purposeful work on refocusing economy into investment and innovative development model is being conducted. Increase of investments inflow is a priority area for regional authorities. At this point, systematic measures for promoting favourable investment climate, encouraging and facilitating the investors’ activity in the territory of the region are being implemented. This booklet is a part of a comprehensive approach to informing prospective investors about potential and investment opportunities of the Rivne region. The regional authorities are open to cooperation! V. Bertash U. Kichatyi 2

3. TABLE OF CONTENTS General information Geographic location 4 Territorial system 5 Infrastructure 5 Demographics 5 Infrastructure map of the region 6 Natural resources 7 Resources map of the region 8 Economic figures 9 Labour force and HR support 10 Incentives for investors 11 Investment activity 11 Support for investors 12 Land plot offers of the Rivne region Land area more than 50 ha 13-15 Land area from 20 ha to 50 ha 16-21 Land area less than 20 ha 22-27 Real estate offers of the Rivne region Floor area more than 15 000 sq. meters 28-35 Floor area less than 15 000 sq. meters 36-41 Investment projects of the Rivne region Investment projects of the operating enterprises 42-47 Investment projects on seed stage 48-53 3

4. Rivne Region is located in the north-west of Ukraine and enjoys favorable GEOGRAPHIC LOCATION geographic position for servicing the markets of the European Union, Russia, Belarus and Ukraine. The Region is situated at the crossroads of international motorways and railways connecting Europe with Asia and the Baltic Sea with the Black Sea. The distance to the EU border is just 100 km (1.5 hours drive) and 250 km (3 hours drive) to Kyiv, the capital of Ukraine. During evaluation in 2007, the specialists of the Financial Times admitted that Rivne region is the lowest cost location for business in Europe located in its very heart. 4

5. • Regional capital Rivne city TERRITORIAL SYSTEM • Administrative structure 16 districts • Borders Belarus Republic • Area: 20,1 thousand sq. km agricultural land 46 % forest 40 % • Main roads 5060 km INFRASTRUCTURE • Railways 587 km • Airport 1 E373 Lublin Chelm Kovel Sarny Kyiv European transport highways that cross Rivne region: E40 Brussels Dresden Krakow Rivne Kyiv E85 Klaipeda Vilnius Dubno Bucharest Alexandroupolis • Population of the region: 1,2 million people DEMOGRAPHICS urban 47,8% rural 52,2% • Key cities: Rivne 248,3 thousand people Dubno 38,1 thousand people Kuznetsovsk 40,0 thousand people Ostroh 15,3 thousand people • The birth rate – 14.9 per 1000 people of the actual population (1st place in Ukraine) 5

6. 7. NATURAL RESOURCES Over 600 deposits of 18 types of minerals: • Amber – the sole Ukrainian deposits • Touchstone - unique deposits • Building sand – 54 mln. cub. m • Building stones - granite, diorite, granodiorite • Peat – 150 mln. tons or 20% of the national stock • Large mineral water stocks • The Region is rich in wood, the stocks of which amount to 112.8 mln. cub. m • Land resources – 21.1 thousand sq. km 48.3 % arable 39.9 % forest 7

ECONOMY 2012 • Budget of the region USD 667,8 million • Industrial output USD 1908 million • Agricultural output USD 708 million • Foreign direct investments USD 293,9 million • Goods export USD 543,1 million • Goods import USD 431 million • Average salary USD 300 • Unemployment rate 10,1 % Structure of gross value added by types of activity Industry 21,6 % 26,4 % Agriculture, hunting, forestry Building Trade 9,1 % Transport and communication Education 9,4 % 16 % 13,2 % 4,3 % Other Structure of industrial output Production and distribution of electric energy, gas, water 2,3 % 0,7 % Food industry 4,9 % 3,4 % 7,7 % Chemical industry 31,5 % Construction materials and 12,1 % glassware Woodworking 18,1 % 17,6 % Machine-building Extractive industry Metallurgy Light industry 9

10. • 25 % of population have COMPETITIVE LABOUR FORCE higher education Structure of employed population • 43.8% of population have by types of economic activity technical professional 7% 6,1 % qualification 9,6 % 4,8 % 13,7 % 13,5 % • 24 technical schools • 33 higher educational 18,5 % 26,8 % institutions and 5 000 graduates annually Building Transport and communication • Unemployment rate: Health care and special assistance 10.1% - according to ILO Education methodology Industry Agriculture • Average salary - USD 300 Trade, hotels and restaurants Other HR SUPPORT Regional employment service at its own cost and onsite its own educational and production complexes provides training of required number of specialists according to the request of Rivne training center investor. The training may be implemented under the supervision of investor’s representatives and using the equipment of particular company, which is installed at the educational and production complex of the Employment Educational and production service. complex with dormitory 10

11. INCENTIVES FOR INVESTORS Subsidy may be granted to compensate up to 50% of labour expenditures during the first year after launch of the project. INVESTMENT ACTIVITY Major foreign investors Countries with the highest volume of FDI in Rivne region in Rivne region (USD mln.) as of 01.10.2012 62,4 73,9 39,3 44,9 25,1 10,2 20,6 17,5 Germany Italy Great Britain Russian Federation USA Netherlands Cyprus Other countries Industry-based FDI volume in the economy of Rivne region, as of 01.10.2012 51,46 % 0,1 % 5,40 % 15,06 % 7,17 % 12,86 % 8,04 % Industry Trade; repair of automobiles, household and personal demand items Transport and communication Real estate, lease, engineering and services for entrepreneurs Building Agriculture, hunting, forestry Other 11

12. Foreign investors can obtain professional support from a specialized SUPPORT FOR INVESTORS organization – InvestInRivne Agency, which is intended to assist investors and businesses in Rivne region in site selection and settlement, starting business and implementation of all phases of investment project. The Agency was found by local authorities with the support of the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe (OSCE). • Government • State administrations • Municipalities • Permitting bodies • Local partners • Contractors INVESTOR • Consultants Services of the Agency – “One-stop-shop” for investors Investment Investment Post- Preparation Implementation Investment Support • Provision of analytical data • Support in administrative • Relationship management about the region, Ukraine, procedures (quick with local authorities etc. registration, licenses • Search and exposure of and permits, etc.) • Support in taxation, investment opportunities • Support in legal issues, customs procedures, (land plots, real estate, taxation, accounting, IPR accounting projects) protection • HR support • Market research and • Assistance in selection of feasibility studies engineering and building • Assistance in receipt of • Organization of visits, companies visas and labour permits meetings and negotiations • Support in negotiations • Support in PR campaigns • Search for potential • Translation services partners/suppliers • HR support, labour permits 12

42. INVESTMENT PROJECTS OF THE RIVNE REGION Wholesale agricultural market Shelen Building wholesale agricultural market. Private. Name • Meat and meat products. Property • Milk and dairy products. • Fish and fish products. • Sugar. • Vegetable oils. • Potatoes. Basic • Vegetables and gourds. production • Fruit, berries, nuts, grapes. • Bread and bakery products. Shelen market was assigned (by the government of Ukraine) the status of a wholesale market of agricultural products that stipulates its monopoly position in this segment in the whole territory of the Rivne region. For the purposes of market construction all necessary design documents and approvals have been received. Prospective investments will be directed Project to construction of supportive pavilion structures, exterior description walls, concrete floor, unloading platforms and basic elements of technical infrastructure (water supply and wastewater discharge, power supply etc. according to the regulatory documents). Participation by investing $ 17 000 000 in exchange for a part of corporate rights of the wholesale market. Investment offer Payback period 7 – 8 years. 42

43. INVESTMENT PROJECTS OF THE RIVNE REGION Dairy and fruit processing Modernization of operating dairy and fruit processing enterprise (hereinafter – the Company) . Name Private. Milk processing factory: semisoft cheese “Cheddar”, cheese Property “Adygeiskyi”, brynza, sour-milk drink “Snizhok”, yoghurt “Stolychnyi”, pasteurized milk, sour cream, kefir, fermented baked milk (ryazenka), cream. Berries, vegetables, and fruit processing factory: juices, jams, Basic fruit butter, pastes, puree, squash spread, heterogeneous and production homogenous fruit and berry fillers (topping) for ice-cream, sour- milk and dessert products, as well as confectionary and bakery. Purchasing automatic packaging devices, cheese-forming equipment, sterilization lines, lines for antiseptic products packaging, and equipment for fruit and berries treatment. Creation of own plantations with a starting area of 6 ha for fruit and berries growing, construction of fully-equipped Project low-temperature cold chambers with capacity amounting to description over 200 tons of berries and constant temperature of -300С for durable storage of raw material. Participation by investing $ 2 500 000 in exchange for a part of corporate rights of the Company. Purchasing 100% of the Company’s corporate rights on conditions that are to be discussed further. Investment offer Payback period 3 years. 43

At present the Company is engaged in filtration, freezing, hydration, refining, deodorization as well as packing finished products into own PET bottles of different size (from 0.82 to 5.0 liters), bearing the company’s trademark Radema which is well Project known in the region for its good quality. description The Company received a number of awards from Ukrainian government due to high quality of products and has all the required licenses, permits and certificates. Existing long-term contracts ensure a wide sale network of the Company not only within Ukraine but also abroad (Belarus, EU). The project cost is $ 23 550 000, including the share of the Company that amounts to $ 2 500 000. The Company invites investors to provide the total amount of $ 21 050 000 in exchange for a part of the Company's corporate rights. Investment offer Payback period 3 years. 44
